__e: Ten years during which she had ceased to love and feel guilty of what happened.
To love her and worship her and keep her in sickness and in health?
For richer and for poorer, for better and for worse, in sickness and in health, to love and to cherish till death us do part.
And he becomes a demigod by transference, in fact he comes down from the sky to love and protect her.
Do you, Leo, take Sarah to be your wife, to have and to hold from this day forward, for better, for worse, for richer, for poorer, to love and to cherish?

Do you, Kermit, take this woman to be your lawful wedded wife to love and to cherish, to have and to hold, and forsaking all others will you cleave to her and to her only so long as you both shall live?
Little brother. not only do you want to love her. you want to make love to her!
In that endless searching, I stopped loving him... but he still doesn't understand... that it is possible.
It doesn't mean that a part of me won't always love him, and maybe we'll find our way back to each other, one day.
